betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Indestructible Ichorium Shovel has three modes:

Block Mode (Green): It digs normally, like a standard shovel.

Square Mode (Red): It digs a 5x5 area around the starting block.

Column Mode (Blue): It digs in a vertical column, 8 blocks above and 8 blocks below the starting block, removing blocks of the same type as the starting block.
